198050.「…………いってぇーーッ。\n やべ アタマ打ったわ……死ぬかも。:
Ouuuuch.... Man, I hit my head... I think
I'm gonna die here...

198051.「ハハッ <pc>っちも\n バナナの皮 踏んづけて 転んだのか～。\n やっぱ:
Haha! So you slipped on banana peel too?
Guess it's just inevitable as gadabouts, huh?

198053.「な…なんでやねん！ アホちゃうかァ ワレ！！\n そこで バナナの皮で ズッコ:
Y...youse gotta be kiddin' me! You stupid or
somethin'?! Did I not tell you that a gadabout
slipped on a banana peel here and died?!

198054.「ワイは 置いてあるモン 取ってこい\n 言うたのに なに踏んでんねん！！\n:
I told ya to get what was left behind, so why
did ya step on it?! And the way ya fell,
too... Definitely the cherry on top!!

198055.「……チクショーーーッ！\n お題を無視するだけやのうて 死をもおそれず\n 遊:
DAAAAAAAAARN YOUUUUU!!! Not only didja
ignore my instructions, but are willing to
play with death, too? Whassa matter with you?!<me 71>

198056.「おっ！ マジか！\n やったな <pc>っち！！\n イマドキの遊び人のチカラ:
Wow, really?! Nice job! You passed!
You sure showed them the power of
a trendy gadabout!

198057.「うふ…… 今回の試練は アナタたちの\n 遊び人としての度量を 試していたのだ:
Hmm hmm... This trial was meant to test your
skills as gadabouts, but, alas...
You managed to pass, huh... <heart>

198058.「……だ…だが まだやでッ！\n 試練が ひとつだとは ひと言もゆーてへん！\n:
...b..but it ain't over just yet! I never said
this'd be the only trial! I ain't ready to
admit that you're true gadabouts just yet...

198059.「ルッチーちゃ～んっ！！\n たいへん！！ たいへんなの～っ！！:
Luuuuuuuchie! This is bad! This is reaaaally
bad!!

198060.「ゴ…ゴランゾちゃんが……\n 労魔デスワークに 襲われたの！！:
G...Golanzo, he...
He was attacked by Deathwork!!

198062.「ゴラちゃん……遊びから 戻ってきたと思ったら\n 急に 遊び人をやめて 働くん:
J...just when I thought he'd come back from goofing around, he said he was gonna stop being a gadabout and start working instead...
I had no idea what to do...

198063.「オイッ！！\n アンタたちが 何かしたんじゃねーだろーな！？:
HEY!! You two wouldn't be behind this,
would ya?!

198064.「ハ…ハァ～？ ジョーダンはヨシコさんやで！？\n ワイら ずっと この場所にお:
H...huh?! Is this some kinda joke?! We've been
here the entire time! We wouldn't just go and
attack yer friends! It'd be impossible!!

198065.「疑うのも わかんなくはないけど～\n これだけは 信じてほしいの……\n アタ:
I know you have your doubts, buuuut...
You have to believe us.... We have nothing
to do with Deathwork. <heart>

198066.「アリバイありってことか。\n ……わかった。\n アンタたちの言うことを 信じ:
So that's your alibi, huh?
...all right. I'll trust what you say.

198067.「……なあ ピンキー。\n ゴランゾは 今 どこに？: Say, Pinky... Where is Golanzo now?

198068.「えーと ゴラちゃんは……グレン城の\n 武器鍛冶ギルドで 働くって言ってたかな:
Um, let's see... I think he said he was gonna
go work at the Weaponsmithing Guild inside
of Glen Castle...

198069.「<pc>っち…… デスワークに襲われた\n ゴランゾのことが とにかく 心配だ:
I'm worried about Golanzo, <pc>...
Let's head over to the Weaponsmithing
Guild in Glen Castle!

198070.「今日中に……\n どうのつるぎ★３を……５００本……\n 作らなくては……ブツ:
Today I have to... make five hundred...
three-star Copper Swords...
*mumble, mumble*...

198071.「……おいおい ゴランゾ～。\n いったい どうしちまったんだよ。\n なに こ:
Hey, Gonlanzo! What the heck is wrong with
you? Why are you goofing around in a place
like this?

198072.「……おや ルッチー氏。\n いつも お世話になっております。:
Oh, Lucchie, it's you...
Thank you for everything.

198073.「ですが ちがいますよ ルッチー氏。\n 遊んでいるのではなくて 働いているので:
But you're wrong...I'm not goofing off here,
I'm working. I'm not a gadabout anymore.

198075.「あっ そうでした……これは 不覚。\n 親方に 素材の調達を 頼まれていました:
Oh, that's right... I was asked by the boss to
get some materials. How embarrassing...

198076.「……ということで ルッチー氏。\n 今まで お世話になりました。\n 私は 仕:
...anyways, Lucchie... Thanks for everything
you've done for me up 'til now. I'm swamped
with work, so you'll have to excuse me.

198077.「もう イヤ……。\n あたしも 遊び人やめる。:
I can't do this anymore...
I'm gonna quit being a gadabout too.

198079.「デスワークに 襲われたら……あんなふうに\n 自分じゃないみたいに なっちゃう:
If Deathwork attacked me...then I wouldn't be
like myself anymore, right? If I stay a
gadabout, then I'm just another target...

198080.「あたしは ただ みんなと一緒に\n 楽しいことをして 遊びたいだけなのに……。:
All I wanna do is have fun and goof off with
you guys, but...this is just too much...
I can't do this anymore!

198083.「ほーれ 言わんこっちゃあらへんわァ。\n 遊びクラブとやらも 解散やな～。:
Well, well. Guess you've got no choice now.
Looks like the Play Club's goin' bye-bye.

198084.「せやから 遊び人はやめとけ いうたやろ～？\n 遊び人なんて ロクなこと ない:
That's why I told you not to be a gadabout,
remember? They're no good. You'll have fun
now, but later? You'll just regret it.

198085.「そうよ～ アナタだって もう大人でしょ～？\n 遊び人だなんて ふざけたことし:
Exactly right～ Aren't you all grown up now?
Shouldn't you stop goofing around as a
gadabout and start facing reality?

198086.「そや そや！ 言うたれ！ 遊び人なんてな～\n くさった死体にたかる ハエのよ:
That's right! You tell 'em! Bein' a gadabout
is like bein' a fly buzzin' around a Walking
Corpse! Just knock it off already!

198088.「おいおいおい まさか……\n どいつもこいつも 似たようなことばかり\n 言い:
Wait, wait, hang on...
I thought you guys were just saying the
same things over and over again...

198089.「アンタたち……ペアレンツ？\n ……父ちゃんと 母ちゃんなのか？:
Are you...my parents?
Dad, mom? Is that you?

198090.「ハ…ハァ～！？ ジョーダンはヨシコさんや！\n んなワケあらへんわ！！:
W...WHAT?! D-don't be ridiculous!
Not a chance in heck that's true!!

198091.「あはっ ちょっと急用 思いだしちゃったゾ～<heart>\n それじゃ バイバ:
Aha, well... I just remembered something
really important I have to do～<heart>
Bye-bye for now...!

198093.しかし まわりこまれてしまった！: But the enemy has them surrounded!

198094.「ウギギギ……あかん！ もうあかん！！:
Gggghhh.... It's no use! I can't keep this up
any longer!

198097.「アハハハ！ ペアレンツ 遊び人だったんかよ！\n つまんねー親だとばっかり 思:
Ahahah! So you guys really WERE gadabouts
after all! And here I thought you guys were
super boring...but you're actually HILARIOUS!!

198098.「や…やかましいわ！\n これは お前のためを思って\n やっていたことなんだぞ:
S...stop that! Everything we did was for your
sake!

198099.「そうよ！ 遊び人を襲うデスワークの話を知って\n あなたの身を案じたから ひと:
He's right! When we heard that Deathwork was attacking gadabouts, we were really worried about you! That's why we put on this little
act! We didn't want you being a gadabout anymore!

198100.「……私たちは たしかに 昔 遊び人だった。\n だが やみくもに遊びまわってい:
...we used to be gadabouts too, you know. But one day, I was recklessly goofing off in that abandoned castle when I slipped on a banana
peel and hit my head...

198101.「なあ ルッチー…… もう一度 問おう。\n 私たちの過ちを くり返してほしくな:
Lucchie, please...let me ask you one last time. I don't want you to repeat the same mistakes we made. You really have no
intention of quitting being a gadabout?

198102.「……忠告ありがとよ～。でも オレっちは\n いつでも ガチで 遊び人やってんだ:
...I appreciate the advice. But being a gadabout has always been my calling. I've decided that this is what I wanna do for the
rest of my life!

198103.「それに デスワークのヤローを ぶっ飛ばして\n 遊びクラブの仲間を 元に戻す仕:
Besides...I still gotta job to do by beatin' the tar of that Deathwork creep and gettin' the Play Club back to how it was. So I'm
gonna stay a gadabout, no matter what!

198104.「そうか…… そこまで言うのならば 仕方ない。\n 私たちのふたりの血を 受け継:
I see...if you feel that strongly about it, then we can't stop you. As our son, your strong desire to be a gadabout most likely
came from us.

198105.「デスワークを倒す……と言ったな。\n ならば 私たちが 現役時代に編みだした\:
You said you wanted to defeat Deathwork, right...? Let me teach you this secret trick, then. We came up with it while we were still
gadabouts. Hopefully it comes in handy.

198106.「うおお なんだこれ スゲーッ！！\n バイブス アガってきたーーーッ！！:
Whoa!! What is this?! It's amazing!!!
My vibes are VIBING!!!

198108.「っしゃー！ このチカラで デスワークを\n ぶっ飛ばして みんなを 元通りにし:
Awright! I'm gonna use this to lay the smackdown on Deathwork and make everyone normal again! Dad, Mom...you guys are
seriously the best!

198109.「<pc>っちも あんがとな！\n お礼したいから 遊びハウスまで 来てくれよ。:
And thank you too, <pc>!
I wanna show my thanks, so meet me back at the
Gadabode. Lee ya sater!

204435.「その時……世の無常と 真理の道を悟ってな。\n じつは 試練の中にあった 死ん:
That was the moment I realized how fragile we
really are and the truth of things. And the
dead gadabouts from that trial...that was us.
